original_title: Bon Jovi: In Concert - BBC Radio 2
overview: Jo Whiley presents Bon Jovi live In Concert from the intimate BBC Radio Theatre inside Broadcasting House  They'll be playing some of their stadium-filling biggest hits alongside an early taster of their new material.  On Thursday 24 January, Radio 2 welcomed Bon Jovi to the BBC Radio Theatre for a very special Radio 2 In Concert performance. The band spoke to Jo Whiley and answered listeners' questions before playing hits and selections from their new album, What About Now.
title: Bon Jovi: In Concert - BBC Radio 2
